name: Production-Water-App for Developers
description: An analytical app that enables to analyse the water production over demand prediction

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Production Water Over-Demand Prediction App

Overview

This app enables business users to predict excess water usage in production environments by analyzing operational and environmental factors. By leveraging advanced regression models, the app identifies patterns of over-demand based on features like employee count, pipeline length, and daily abstraction, helping organizations optimize resource utilization and implement proactive water management strategies.

Input

  • + Uploaded data
  • + Training Features

Output

  • + Excess Usage Prediction: Predict whether usage exceeds demand
  • + Feature Importance: Visual ranking of feature influence
  • + Training Metrics: Accuracy, precision, etc. to evaluate model performance
  • + Distribution & Correlation Insights on key features

Benefits

  • + Operational Optimization: Enables better planning and water conservation
  • + Sustainability & Compliance: Supports environmental regulations
  • + Data-Driven Action: Guides maintenance, staffing, and policy changes
  • + Flexibility: Model and feature selection tailored to facility and industry
  • + Ease of Use: Intuitive UI for both technical and non-technical users
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html4", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Data Description

Field Name Description
DateThe date of the record.
Employee_CountThe number of employees recorded on the specified date.
Main Pipe LengthThe length of the main pipe, likely in meters or kilometers.
Date_dtThe formatted date in a standardized datetime format.
Date_dt_monthnameThe name of the month extracted from the date.
Over_Abstraction_MedianMedian value for over abstraction, possibly used as a threshold.
LeakageThe amount of water lost due to leaks.
Over_DemandInstances of demand exceeding supply or capacity.
Unique_ReasonsThe count of unique reasons leading to issues or anomalies.
Date_dt_monthThe month extracted from the date.
OverAbstractionInstances or volume of water abstracted beyond the norm.
Date_dt_dayofweekThe day of the week extracted from the date.
Excess_UsageBinary or categorical indicator for excessive water usage.
Large_IndustryIndicates involvement or volume of large industries.
Mid_IndustryIndicates involvement or volume of medium industries.
Small_IndustrykIndicates involvement or volume of small industries.
Daily_Abstraction_AvgThe average amount of water abstracted daily.
Cooling_WaterThe volume of water used for cooling.
Injection_WaterThe volume of water used for injection.
Production_WaterThe volume of water used for production.
Processing_WaterThe volume of water used for processing.
Waste_WaterThe volume of wastewater recorded.
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html2", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "Columns", "columns": [ { "components": [], "width": 6, "offset": 0, "push": 0, "pull": 0, "size": "md", "currentWidth": 6 }, { "components": [ { "label": "Next", "action": "event", "showValidations": false, "theme": "info", "customClass": "btn- mt-0 float-right", "tableView": false, "key": "next", "type": "button", "event": "next", "input": true, "hideOnChildrenHidden": false } ], "width": 6, "offset": 0, "push": 0, "pull": 0, "size": "md", "currentWidth": 6 } ], "key": "columns1", "type": "columns", "input": false, "tableView": false, "keyModified": true } ] }
